profile.name: ISO 19005-2:2011 - 6.1.3 File trailer - ID keyword
profile.description: The file trailer dictionary shall contain the ID keyword whose value shall be File Identifiers as defined in ISO 32000-1:2008, 14.4
profile.creator: veraPDF Consortium

rule.description: The file trailer dictionary shall contain the ID keyword whose value shall be File Identifiers as defined in ISO 32000-1:2008, 14.4

error.message: Missing ID in the document trailer
